original_text: And Hezekiah had very great riches and honor, and he made for himself treasuries for silver, for gold, for precious stones, for spices, for shields, and for all kinds of costly vessels;
korean_text: 히스기야가 부와 영광이 지극한지라 이에 은금과 보석과 향품과 방패와 온갖 보배로운 그릇들을 위하여 창고를 세우며

sentences.original_text: And Hezekiah had very great riches and honor
sentences.korean_translation: 히스기야는 매우 큰 부와 영광을 누렸습니다

sentences.original_text: and he made for himself treasuries
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 자신을 위해 보물 창고를 만들었습니다

sentences.original_text: and for all kinds of costly vessels
